description:
Cozy leggings that make heading out into the cold, a bit less daunting. Made from a stretchy recycled blend, the Winter Warm Essential leggings put a soft fleecy layer between you and winter’s worst.

  • Recycled poly blend has a smooth woven exterior, and a soft brushed interior
  • FlashDry™ finish on the fabric improves wicking and reduces drying times
  • Contoured waistband sits slightly higher at the back and is double layered for more support
  • Large rear drop-in pocket is there for your phone and keys
  • Slim, athletic fit
name: The North Face Winter Warm Essential Leggings - Women's
